typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{ vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventedirecte
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> comptesap
source(output(
		{Cl� R�f�rentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Cl� EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal d�but} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{D�partement} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtc
source(output(
		Commande as string,
		{Référence Offre BA} as string,
		{Qté Cdée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> associationoffre
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offre
Select5 derive(distributeur = "vente directe",
		{Diffus/chantier} = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43", "Chantier", "Diffus"),
		{marque(SD/vaillant)} = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> addCols
comptesap select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> projection
projection aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal}),
	{Agence commerciale} = max({Agence commerciale})) ~> dropDuplicade
Select1, dropDuplicade join({Code client} == Client,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> sapJoin
addCols select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Code client} = {Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		{Diffus/chantier},
		{marque(SD/vaillant)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
sapJoin, atcDropDuplicate join({Diffus/chantier} == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& {marque(SD/vaillant)} == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinAtc
refAtc select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy({Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC),
	Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> atcDropDuplicate
joinAtc, associationoffre join({Document de vente} == Commande,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinAssociation
offre select(mapColumn(
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance} = CodeATC,
		canal = Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		{ATC performance},
		canal),
	Responsable = max(Responsable)) ~> offreDropDuplicade
joinAssociation, offreDropDuplicade join({Référence Offre BA} == Offre
	&& {Canal final} == canal,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinOffre
mapping select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name = {marque(SD/vaillant)},
		canal_final = {Diffus/chantier},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		POSSAMidString = {Code client},
		reference = Article,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		yearmonth,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		{Agence commerciale} = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		no_offre = {Référence Offre BA},
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
joinOffre derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation") ~> mapping
ventedirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente} = { vente},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		fact_filter,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OVenteDirectePrepared'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> oVenteDirect
